step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position. Keep your arm straight overhead and feel that gentle resistance.
Excellent! Your arm is well-stretched overhead. Remember to maintain this position throughout the exercise.
Great! Keep your palm and fingers open wide as instructed.
Nicely done! You made a good fist while inhaling and tightening your muscles. Visualize the fluid moving.
Good start for the second rep. Ensure your arm remains straight overhead, feeling the stretch.
Well done maintaining the overhead stretch. Keep your arm extended.
Excellent! Continue to open your hand and fingers wide.
Fantastic! You made a strong fist while inhaling. Keep up the great work visualizing the fluid movement.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and feel the resistance. Continue to open your hand wide and make a tight fist while inhaling, then relax as you exhale. Keep visualizing the fluid moving.
